ModMetaData.name: Fendra Race
ModMetaData.author: Shadow
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Fendra, a race of small canines, to Rimworld.\n\nDespite their fur, they do very poorly in cold temperatures. To compensate, they can research advanced, form-fitting bodysuits that help them survive harsh weather. Ideologically, Fendra are innate scientists and researchers who focus on the collective good of their society, though they can pack a punch too if need be.
